question: Which country houses the headquarters of the "INTERPOL"?
explanation: The headquarters of the International Criminal Police Organization, commonly known as INTERPOL, is located in Lyon, an urban area of France. The International Criminal Police Organization, commonly known as INTERPOL, is an international organisation that facilitates worldwide police cooperation and crime control. It has seven regional bureaus worldwide and a National Central Bureau in all 194 member states, making it the world's largest police organization.
